title: travelplanner: Could you put together a 5-day travel plan starting in Charlotte and visiting 2 cities in New Jersey? The dates of travel are from March 6th to March 10th, 2022, and I have a budget of $4,200. (252bcc1898f81574)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.content: Could you put together a 5-day travel plan starting in Charlotte and visiting 2 cities in New Jersey? The dates of travel are from March 6th to March 10th, 2022, and I have a budget of $4,200.
There is no flight from Charlotte to Atlantic City on 2022-03-06.

chat_history.content:
### 5-Day Travel Plan: Charlotte to New Jersey

#### Days 1 and 2: Atlantic City
Unfortunately, there are no flights available from Charlotte to Atlantic City on March 6, 2022. You could consider driving instead, which would take around 12 hours. 

Once you arrive in Atlantic City, you can check into a hotel or apartment based on your preference and budget. Here are some accommodation options:
- Spacious 1 BD with washer/dryer - $499 for two nights, minimum stay of 2 nights
- Cool, cozy urban pad - $390 for two nights, minimum stay of 2 nights
- Luxury NYC 1 Bed with gorgeous views + pool - $255 for two nights, minimum stay of 2 nights

On the first day, you can explore the city's iconic Atlantic City Boardwalk, which offers a variety of attractions, shops, and restaurants. You can also visit the Atlantic City Aquarium, Absecon Lighthouse, and the Atlantic City Historical Museum. In the evening, there are plenty of dining options, including Hard Rock Cafe, Burma Burma, and Bella Cucina - Le Meridien Gurgaon.

On day 2, you can visit Steel Pier, Central Pier Arcade, and Kennedy Plaza. For a unique experience, take a ride on the Atlantic City Tiki Boat. In the evening, consider dining at one of the many restaurants in the city, such as Ganpati Rasoi, Foodrath, or Tossin Pizza.

#### Days 3 and 4: Trenton
On day 3, you can take a drive from Atlantic City to Trenton, which should take around 1.5 hours. You will be able to find flights from Atlantic City to Trenton on March 8, 2022, but these flights are quite expensive and may exceed your budget.

In Trenton, you have accommodation options such as:
- Whole Floor, 2 BR Apt. in Iconic Greenwich Village - $239 for two nights, minimum stay of 2 nights
- Clean, Cosy Private 1 Bd Apartment Fort Greene - $592 for two nights, minimum stay of 3 nights
- Sun Drenched Spacious Loft in NYC's Trendiest Hood - $848 for two nights, minimum stay of 3 nights

On day 3, visit the Old Barracks Museum, an 18th-century historic site, and the New Jersey State Museum, which showcases the state's history and culture. Other attractions include Cadwalader Park, the Planetarium at NJ State Museum, and the Trenton Battle Monument.

On your last day, explore the 1719 William Trent House Museum, the Trenton City Museum/Ellarslie Museum, and Mill Hill Park. For dining, consider restaurants like Mario's Italian Restaurant, Global Grill, or The Cheesecake Factory.

#### Day 5: Return to Charlotte
On your final day, you can drive back to Charlotte or take a flight if available and within your budget. Please note that these travel plans and prices are subject to change, and it's recommended to check and book travel arrangements closer to your departure date. Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
